content: foundation round using lighter colored yarn make a slip knot leaving long tail chain 2 then make 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 6 single_crochet round 1 without turning make 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet of foundation row *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 12 single_crochet round 2 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet of previous round *2 single_crochet in next single_crochet 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around ending with 2 single_crochet in last single_crochet of previous round 18 single_crochet round 3 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet of previous round 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet *1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet repeat from * around 24 single_crochet begin carrying darker colored yarn round 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet of previous round 24 single_crochet round 5-15 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet of previous round using the chart below where an empty box is a single_crochet done with the lighter color and a box with an x is a single_crochet done with the darker color this chart is read from right to left as the stitches are crocheted there are 24 single_crochet in each row round 5 x x x x x x x round 5 round 6 x x x x x x x x x x x x round 6 round 7 x x x x x x x x x x round 7 round 8 x x x x x x x x x x round 8 round 9 x x x x x x x x x x round 9 round 10 x x x x x x x x x x x round 10 round 11 x x x x x x x x x x x round 11 round 12 x x x x x x x x x x x round 12 round 13 x x x x x x x x x x x round 13 round 14 x x x x x x x x x round 14 round 15 x x x x x x round 15 after round 15 stop carrying darker color it will be picked up again later row 16 using lighter color 1 single_crochet in each of next 11 sl in next single_crochet turn row 17 skipping sl of previous row 1 sl in 1st single_crochet of previous row * 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease repeat from * 2 more times 1 single_crochet in each of next 2 single_crochet insert hook in next single_crochet yo pull up loop insert hook into next single_crochet yo pull up loop and pull through 2 loops on hook = single_crochet sl decrease turn note you will be crocheting into stitches from round 15 in this row row 18 skipping single_crochet sl decrease of previous row 1 sl in 1st single_crochet of previous row * 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet decrease repeat from * 2 more times sl in
